channel.title: [pi] Objects not working?

item.title: [pi] Objects not working?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

So recently i was going to change my home, but i had to add stairs. the top stairs are working just fine, but the bottom stairs only one side works

	case 6087:
		if(c.objectX == 2863 && c.objectY == 10209) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2865, 10209, 1);
		} else if(c.objectX == 2863 && c.objectY == 10188) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2865, 10189, 1);
	 } else if(c.objectX == 2894 && c.objectY == 10188) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2893, 10189, 1);
		} else if(c.objectX == 2894 && c.objectY == 10209) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2895, 10210, 1);
		}
	break;

So i looking in click object.java, and if i add
case 6087
c.objectXoffset = 2;
break

	case 6087:
		if(c.objectX == 2863 && c.objectY == 10209) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2865, 10209, 1);
		} else if(c.objectX == 2863 && c.objectY == 10188) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2865, 10189, 1);	
          } else if(c.objectX == 2894 && c.objectY == 10188) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2893, 10189, 1);
		} else if(c.objectX == 2894 && c.objectY == 10209) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2895, 10210, 1);
		}
	break;

only those 2 work. why is this?

Read full topic
